com.emc.esu.api

Interface ProgressListener


  • public interface ProgressListener
    The progress listener interface is used to report upload and download progress. Create a class that implements this interface and register it with the helper by calling addListener().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onComplete()
      This callback will be invoked after the transfer has completed.
      void onError(java.lang.Exception exception)
      This callback will be invoked if there is an error during the transfer.
      void onProgress(long currentBytes, long bytesTotal)
      This method will be called after a chunk has been transferred.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgress

        void onProgress(long currentBytes,
              long bytesTotal)
        This method will be called after a chunk has been transferred.
        Parameters:
        currentBytes - the number of bytes transferred. Note that the value will be passed as a string since it may be >2GB.
        bytesTotal - the total number of bytes to transfer. If the total number of bytes is unknown, this value will be -1. Note that the value will be passed as a string since it may be >2GB.

      • onComplete

        void onComplete()
        This callback will be invoked after the transfer has completed.

      • onError

        void onError(java.lang.Exception exception)
        This callback will be invoked if there is an error during the transfer.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that caused the transfer to fail.
